info.name: Measurement Book Service-Postman Test Suite
info.description:
## Postman Collection Steps

- Setup the environment variables like base_url and auth_token.
- Now first create a Measurement Book by using measurement/_create api.
- To create Measurement its contract should be in accepted state.
- Now after creating the Contract put required details in the Measurement create request body.
- Now the Measurement should be in approved state.
    
- Search the measurement based on different criteria.

exec: pm.test("print and save access token in environment", function () {
